casebody.data:
MOUNTAIN VILLAGES, LLC. et al.
v.
SADLER. No. 204P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 14, 2015. Zara Ellis Sadler, for Sadler, Zara Ellis. Mountain Villages, for Mountain Villages, LLC. Lori Richards, for Mountain Villages, LLC.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the emergency motion filed on the 13th of July 2015 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Dismissed without prejudice by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of July 2015."
